DOC.brief_summary: 12 elderly ( 65-70 year age ) male subject include complete double blind cross-over study . They habituate 21 day either low high protein intake ( 0.7 g/kg 1.5 g/kg , respectively ) . Following 45 day washout period switch alternate group . At end habituation period , investigator measure appearance label amino acid milk protein .
DOC.criteria: Males age 6570 Independently dwell Without major health issue ( blood pressure , cholesterol lipid profile measure assessed physician ) Nondiabetic No organ disease No back pain Not regularly take prescription drug dietary supplement , influence muscle protein synthesis Alcohol intake 21 unit pr . week No know arthrosclerosis
